question: Who among the following was the most reputed historian of the reign of Shah Jahan?
explanation: Abul Hamid Lahori, the most reputed historian of the reign of Shah Jahan, wrote the detailed account of Shah Jahan from his childhood to November 1649. Abdul Hamid Lahoriâ€™s Padshahnama is a first-rate authority on the reign of Shah Jahan.
